description: Durable and technical leggings with multiple drop-in pockets got an upgrade: DuraPrint™ technology for extra durability and Vantage fabric gives these greater ease, comfort, and movement. As always, Ferrosi is the perfect softshell for lightweight, durable, stretchy, UPF 50+ weather resistance in an ideal spring and summer weight for climbing, hiking, and multi-sport days. Plus, an eco-friendly fabric that's 46% recycled nylon with improved stretch and recovery for multi-day use.
name: Outdoor Research Ferrosi Convertible Pants, 34" Inseam - Mens
